languages.text: Прошло уже достаточно времени, чтобы ситуация в Теневых кварталах разрешилась... так или иначе.
By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.
languages.original_text: Прошло уже достаточно времени, чтобы ситуация в Теневых кварталах разрешилась... так или иначе.

traits.locale_text: By now the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to some conclusion… in one fashion or another.
By now the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to some conclusion… in one fashion or another.
By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.
By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

languages.text: 今ごろは、シャドウクォーターの件は、片がついてるはずだ……どっちにしろな。
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

traits.locale_text: 今ごろは、シャドウ・クォーターズの件は、片がついてるはずだ……どっちにしろな。
今ごろは、シャドウクォーターの件は、片がついてるはずだ……どっちにしろな。

languages.text: El incidente de los barrios bajos ya debería haberse zanjado... para bien o para mal.
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

traits.locale_text: El incidente de los barrios bajos ya debería haberse zanjado... para bien o para mal.

languages.text: 事到如今，阴影区的发生的事情肯定已经结束了……无论是以何种方式结束。
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

traits.locale_text: 事到如今，阴影区的发生的事情肯定已经结束了……无论是以何种方式结束。

languages.text: Mittlerweile müsste sich die Angelegenheit in den Schattenquartieren erledigt haben ... so oder so.
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

traits.locale_text: Mittlerweile müsste sich die Angelegenheit in den Schattenquartieren erledigt haben ... so oder so.

languages.text: Le problème du Quartier des Ombres doit certainement être réglé, désormais… d'une manière ou d'une autre.
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.

traits.locale_text: Le problème du Quartier des Ombres doit certainement être réglé, désormais… d'une manière ou d'une autre.

languages.text: Gölge Mahalli'ndeki mesele, şimdiye dek bir şekilde bir sonuca varmış olmalı...
languages.original_text: By now, the matter in the Shadow Quarters must surely have come to a conclusion… in one form or another.
